Mission 11: Dividing Fractions

[SYSTEM NOTIFICATION] A C-Rank Gate has been detected. Difficulty: Advanced. Hunter, prepare to slice through the Fraction Realm!

The Challenge Awaits

Young Hunter, fractions are everywhere‚Äîdividing loot, splitting party resources, calculating potion dosages. But dividing fractions? That's where many Hunters fall.

Today, you learn the secret technique: "Keep, Change, Flip." Master it, and no fraction puzzle will defeat you.

‚öîÔ∏è Hunter's Arsenal (Gear Checklist)

Gather these exact items before entering the Gate: - Circle fraction manipulatives (or cut paper plates into sections) - Paper and pencil

üéØ Mission Objectives

Upon completion of this Gate, you will have unlocked: - Fraction Division - Divide two fractions (6.NS.1a) - Visual Problem Solving - Use fraction models to solve word problems (6.NS.1b) - Quotient Interpretation - Explain what the answer means in context (6.NS.1c)

üìñ The Hunter's Knowledge (Brain Download)

The Secret Technique: Keep, Change, Flip!

To divide fractions, follow these three steps:

2/3 √∑ 1/2 = ?

Step 1: KEEP the first fraction    ‚Üí 2/3
Step 2: CHANGE √∑ to √ó              ‚Üí √ó
Step 3: FLIP the second fraction   ‚Üí 2/1

2/3 √ó 2/1 = 4/3 = 1‚Öì

Why Does This Work?

Dividing by a fraction is the same as multiplying by its reciprocal:

Dividing by 1/2 means: "How many halves fit in here?"

In 2/3 of a pizza, there is 1‚Öì halves.

Visual Understanding

Original pizza: 2/3 remaining
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ ‚ñì ‚îÇ ‚ñì ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
  2/3 shaded

Question: How many 1/2 portions fit in 2/3?

Answer: 1 full half + 1/3 of a half = 1‚Öì

Video Lessons: - Effect of Dividing with Fractions | CK-12 Foundation - Quotients of Fractions | CK-12 Foundation - Dividing Fractions Video - Flipping the Fractions | CK-12 PLIX Series

üó°Ô∏è The Quest (Activity)

üìú Verbatim Instructions:

Get the fraction manipulatives ready for the students.

Review the rules for dividing fractions.

Ask the students if they had ‚Öî of a pizza and they divide the ‚Öî by ¬Ω how many pieces would they have? Give other similar problems such as ¬æ √∑ ¬º ; ‚Öñ √∑ ¬Ω

Family Pizza Night Challenge: Your family got 4 kinds of pizza for dinner last night. 1/3 of the pineapple, 1/4 of the pepperoni and 1/2 of the cheese is left. You want to split each kind in 1/2 with your brother. How much pizza will you get?

üí° Hunter's Strategy Guide

Problem 1: ‚Öî √∑ ¬Ω

Keep:   2/3
Change: √∑ ‚Üí √ó
Flip:   1/2 ‚Üí 2/1

2/3 √ó 2/1 = 4/3 = 1‚Öì

Answer: You would have 1‚Öì pieces

Problem 2: ¬æ √∑ ¬º

Keep:   3/4
Change: √∑ ‚Üí √ó
Flip:   1/4 ‚Üí 4/1

3/4 √ó 4/1 = 12/4 = 3

Answer: 3 pieces (because 3 quarters contain 3 quarter-portions)

Problem 3: ‚Öñ √∑ ¬Ω

Keep:   2/5
Change: √∑ ‚Üí √ó
Flip:   1/2 ‚Üí 2/1

2/5 √ó 2/1 = 4/5

Answer: 4/5 of a piece

Family Pizza Challenge:

Leftover pizza portions, split with brother:

Pineapple: 1/3 √∑ 2 = 1/3 √ó 1/2 = 1/6
Pepperoni: 1/4 √∑ 2 = 1/4 √ó 1/2 = 1/8
Cheese:    1/2 √∑ 2 = 1/2 √ó 1/2 = 1/4

YOU get: 1/6 pineapple + 1/8 pepperoni + 1/4 cheese

Claude Code Training

[TRAINING PROTOCOL ACTIVATED]
Before attempting the assignment, you must train with your AI companion. Claude will guide you through the concepts and verify your understanding.

Step 1: Open Your Terminal

Open a terminal on your computer and run this command to start Claude Code:

claude --dangerously-skip-permissions

Step 2: Summon Your Guide

Copy and paste this prompt to begin your training:

Hey Claude, I'm Hunter Hyro on Mission 11 about dividing fractions.
I need to master "Keep-Change-Flip" before my pizza assignment.

Be my training guide and:
1. Explain WHY dividing by a fraction means multiplying by its flip
2. Walk me through Keep-Change-Flip with a clear example
3. Give me 3 fraction division problems to solve (check my steps!)
4. Quiz me with a word problem about splitting something
5. Have me explain Keep-Change-Flip in my own words and WHY it works

Only tell me "Quest Unlocked" when I truly understand. Don't let me skip ahead!
Start by asking me: "How many halves fit in 2?" to build intuition.

Step 3: Complete Your Training

Work through all phases with Claude:

  • Phase 1: Learn the concept (Claude explains)
  • Phase 2: Answer checkpoint questions
  • Phase 3: Complete 3 skill trials
  • Phase 4: Pass the Boss Challenge
  • Phase 5: Teach the concept back to Claude

You cannot proceed until Claude says "Quest Unlocked"!

Hunter's Wisdom: "Keep, Change, Flip" is your secret weapon! When you see a division sign with fractions, immediately flip the second fraction and multiply. It's the fastest way through the Fraction Gate!
